quest.name: Disturbing the Peace
journal:
 Quest Sync
Ovelin is in need of a strong pair of hands.

dialogue.name: OVELIN
dialogue.text: Hmmm... You are not of these woods, are you?

dialogue.name: OVELIN
dialogue.text: My sight is all but gone, but there is no mistaking it. You are much too loud when you walk.

dialogue.name: OVELIN
dialogue.text: Yes, there is a certain weight to your steps, a weight that comes from overcoming great hardship. If you would be willing, I have a task for you.

dialogue.name: OVELIN
dialogue.text: There has been a strange commotion coming from Cleric of late. I fear someone─or something─runs amok there. Though I suspect it would prove no match for a hardened traveler such as you.

dialogue.name: OVELIN
dialogue.text: I know not what disturbs the peace of Cleric, but it must be stopped.

dialogue.name: OVELIN
dialogue.text: Do you hear that? ...The sweet sound of silence.

dialogue.name: OVELIN
dialogue.text: It pains me to say such disturbances are not uncommon. The cause most likely being the Light. We do what we can to protect ourselves from its touch, but the animals of the Greatwood are defenseless before its might.

dialogue.name: OVELIN
dialogue.text: Given time, the Light corrupts all, and even if they do not become sin eaters, our only recourse is to deliver them swiftly unto the sunless sea.

dialogue.name: OVELIN
dialogue.text: Harsh, perhaps, but it is the only way to preserve balance here in the Greatwood.
